Faq.answer1: The free version allows up to {maxParticipants} concurrent participants per space. For larger events or commercial use, please contact us.
Faq.answer2: Yes! Bingify is open source under the MIT License. You can view, modify, and contribute to the source code on GitHub.
Faq.answer3: This project is maintained by volunteers. You can support development through GitHub Sponsors, which helps cover hosting costs and development time.
Faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions

Features.communityDescription: Perfect for community events, streams, and parties. Easy for everyone to join and enjoy together.
Features.heading: Why Choose Bingify
Features.noAppDescription: No app installation required. Join instantly from your browser just by sharing a URL.
Features.realtimeDescription: Real-time communication ensures all screens update simultaneously. Experience unity without delay.
Features.subheading: Simple, powerful. A new bingo experience for everyone.
